Package com.glyart.mystral.database

Class Credentials.CredentialsBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.glyart.mystral.database.Credentials.CredentialsBuilder
Enclosing class:
Credentials
public static final class Credentials.CredentialsBuilder extends Object
Represents a builder for creating Credentials objects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    @NotNull Credentials
    build()
    Builds a Credentials object, ready to be passed to Mystral.newDatabase(Credentials).
    If you want async usage you may need Mystral.newAsyncDatabase(Credentials, Executor).
    Credentials.CredentialsBuilder
    host​(@NotNull String hostName)
    Sets the hostname
    Credentials.CredentialsBuilder
    password​(@Nullable String password)
    Sets the password for connecting to a data source.
    Credentials.CredentialsBuilder
    pool​(@Nullable String poolName)
    Sets the name of the data source connection pool.
    Credentials.CredentialsBuilder
    port​(int port)
    Sets the port for connecting to a data source.
    Credentials.CredentialsBuilder
    schema​(@Nullable String schema)
    Sets the initial schema to use after the connection to a data source is successfully established.
    This will not provide the creation of the schema if it doesn't exist.
    Credentials.CredentialsBuilder
    user​(@NotNull String username)
    Sets the username for connecting to a data source.

    • schema

      public Credentials.CredentialsBuilder schema​(@Nullable @Nullable String schema)
      Sets the initial schema to use after the connection to a data source is successfully established.
      This will not provide the creation of the schema if it doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      schema - an existing database schema
      Returns:
      this builder instance

    • pool

    • build

      @NotNull public @NotNull Credentials build()
      Builds a Credentials object, ready to be passed to Mystral.newDatabase(Credentials).
      If you want async usage you may need Mystral.newAsyncDatabase(Credentials, Executor).
      Returns:
      a new instance of Credentials.
      See Also:
      Mystral
